name: Hunt: Showdown - Souls of a Feather
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Scourge: Morrigan (Hunter), Scourge: Midian (Hunter), Wing's Wake (Winfield 1893 Slate Riposte), Heart's Dowry (LeMat Mark II UpperMat), Cagebreaker (Sticky Bomb).
